title: Apfelkorn
text:
Apfelkorn is a sweet <a href="apple">apple</a>-flavored <a href="liqueur">liqueur</a> made from 100% wheat spirit, and blended with apples. It was invented in <a href="Germany">Germany</a> in the 1970s.
The original was made by <a href="Berentzen">Berentzen</a>. Apfelkorn is considered a <a href="schnapps">schnapps</a> and is very sweet with a strong, sweet "apple juice" flavor. Alcohol content is 20% while a typical schnapps is 40%. Apfelkorn was the first of a number of "new" similar liqueurs entering the German market from the late 1970s onwards.
